casebody.data:
State
v.
Larry McLeod Pulley 42P04-8 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2016 Larry McLeod Pulley, for Larry McLeod Pulley. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Vernon K. Stewart, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th of July 2016 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of August 2016."
